settings.title: Multi-Device Charging Station
settings.text: Form and function never charged so good. The NYTSTND brand is leading the charge in the wireless charging device industry. Sourced from local Amish woodworkers, NYTSTND is designed and hand-crafted in beautiful Ohio.The NYTSTND team is proud to manufacture only the highest quality and the most beautifully designed multi-device charging docks in the marketplace.

settings.title: Includes Apple Watch Magnetic Charger
settings.text: NYTSTND, the revolutionary charging station for multiple devices, skillfully incorporates the Apple Watch Magnetic Charger. This seamless integration ensures compatibility with all series of Apple Watch. Designed for efficiency and convenience, this nightstand charging station revolutionizes power delivery by keeping all your essential devices powered up and ready to go.

settings.title: Elevate His Tech Setup
settings.text:
Effortless Charging Meets Exquisite Design.

Celebrate Dads! 20% OFF at NYTSTND with "FORDADS23".

Happy Fathers Day!

Help Dad streamline his tech setup with our meticulously crafted charging stations. These exceptional creations offer wireless charging capabilities and ingenious compartments, keeping all his devices in one organized space.

Our charging stations are available in a range of sophisticated materials, including rich walnut wood and sleek aluminum, giving Dad's space a touch of elegance while providing the ultimate charging experience.

settings.title: Fathers day
settings.text: Made of premium Amish sourced wood and high-quality plastic, designed to blend into any environment. Tidy up your nightstand - organize your mind!

settings.code:
UNIQUE TECHNOLOGY INSIDE

With MagSafe technology NYTSTND chargers provide faster wireless charging for iPhone models containing magnets as the magnets snap-on attachment creates the most energy efficient induction.

settings.pageTextSecound: Form and function never charged so good. The NYTSTND brand is leading the charge in the wireless charging device industry. Sourced from local Amish woodworkers, NYTSTND is designed and hand-crafted in beautiful Ohio. The NYTSTND team is proud to manufacture only the highest quality and the most beautifully designed multi-device charging docks in the marketplace.

settings.blockText: Until a year or so ago, I hadn’t even tried wireless charging. My iPhone at the time was old and couldn’t be charged wirelessly, so I didn’t bother trying out the technology.

Since I'm a notorious electronics nerd, I gave up on keeping my bedside table organized a long time ago. My husband and I were swimming in cables between earbuds, laptops, iPhones, Apple Watches, and iPads. Well, he's still swimming in cables, sadly, but my bedside table is suddenly looking very neat indeed. That's because NYTSTND created a simple, elegant solution to multi-device charging — the NYSTND QUAD charging station.

Cluttered cables and misplaced plugs are a nightmare. Given how we're often reliant on our devices to function, we can't afford to not have charging devices within arm's reach. The easy solution? Investing in charging stations.

If you’ve been waiting for Black Friday to buy the perfect charging station for all your devices, you don’t have to wait anymore. This Nytstnd Quad MagSafe Wireless + USB-C Charging Station lets you charge up to four devices at the same time. And it comes in four beautiful styles and colors that will match perfectly with either your workspace or your nightstand.
settings.blockLabel: Read more on Cult of Mac

settings.blockText: The NYTSTND Quad Tray MagSafe is an expensive four-way charger made from leather and Amish-sourced wood that declutters your bedside table while remaining stylish.

Picture this: On a typical night, my nightstand consists of an iPhone and Apple Watch sloppily plugged into its charger, and somewhere on my wife’s side of the bed is an iPad that’s patiently waiting for its turn to charge. It’s an absolute mess, and I hate it. Not to mention the tug-of-war game of who gets the charger first.

settings.kitSectionText: NYTSTND, a leader in the multi-device charging industry has teamed up with one of the leading Amish woodworking outfits in the Midwest. In fact, we are practically neighbors in Mansfield, Ohio where NYTSTND is headquartered.
settings.kitSectionTextEnd: We love working with journalists around the world. If you’re a member of the media please send an email to info@nytstnd.com

settings.text: 2-in-1 Multi-Device 5-Coil Qi Wireless Handcrafted Charging Station
We heard you! Meet the Magsafe compatibale charging pad with 1-coil full surface charging area
